attributes.action: Give the George Cross to Samir Zitouni
attributes.additional_details: The man ended up in intensive care with life threatening knife wounds. Reward this brave man.
attributes.background: Reward the selfless bravery of this man who nearly died trying to protect his train passengers.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
